casebody.data:
WILKES
v.
CITY OF GREENVILLE. No. 368PA15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 10, 2016. Anita B. Hunt, for Wilkes, Johnnie. Matthew P. Blake, Raleigh, for City of Greenville, et al. J. William Crone, IV, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. J. Timothy Wilson, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. *94Bruce A. Hamilton, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. Tracey L. Jones, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. Allison B. Schafer, Legal Counsel/Director of Policy, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. Christine Teresa Scheef, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. Kimberly S. Hibbard, General Counsel, for N.C. Association of Self-Insurers, et al. M. Duane Jones, Charlotte, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys, et al. Angela Farag Craddock, Raleigh, for N.C. Association of Defense Attorneys, et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 9th of May 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 10th of May 2016."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 23rd day of May 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
